LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.letterText: {SPEAKER_labelShort} is giving {RITUAL_labelIndef}. \nIf all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {SPEAKER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. Positive effects are reduced for non-{IDEOMEMBERS}.
